CONTACT

T-Shirt Design

Typography has always been a challenge to me, but also a really enjoyable mans of expression. Being generally unfamiliar with the power of typographic communication before studying graphic design, I now take great enjoyment from properly comminicating concepts through the use of creative fonts that are appropriate for the given message. The contents on this page are a collection of typographic posters I created to display a typeface I created.
